meanings.sent1: After taking a break from spicy food, I needed to resensitize my taste buds.
meanings.sent2: The therapist helped resensitize the patient's emotional responses.
meanings.sent3: Trying to resensitize a rock to touch would be like teaching a fish to climb a tree.
meanings.sent4: The music festival aimed to resensitize attendees to the beauty of live performances.
meanings.sent5: The documentary sought to resensitize viewers to the plight of endangered species.

meanings.sent1: Using a special cream can help resensitize dry skin.
meanings.sent2: The medication was designed to resensitize the nerves in her fingertips.
meanings.sent3: The magician's trick was to resensitize the audience to the wonder of simple illusions.
meanings.sent4: The sunrise seemed to resensitize the colors of the world after a long night.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of fresh flowers can resensitize your sense of smell after being in a stuffy room.
